original: 徵招的民兵，裝備及訓練素質皆低落，戰力無法期待，不具備兵種特殊技能及剋制效果，僅能算是帳面上的戰力，使用基礎刀劍。
text: The recruited militias have poor equipment and training qualities, and their combat power is unpredictable. They do not have special skills and restraint effects. They can only be regarded as combat power on the book and use basic swords.
